snippet.title: Lobby Loitering Trailer 1
snippet.description:
The first trailer for my newest game, Lobby Loitering! Releasing May 19th, 2023.

In Lobby Loitering, it's up to you to help Marcel return to his world by exploring the chain of odd hotels he gets transferred to. Help eccentric strangers with their daily problems, discover secrets and lore about the worlds you traverse, and get into plenty of places you shouldn't be in.

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2340300/Lobby_Loitering/

Itch.io:
https://viktorthegreat.itch.io/lobby-loitering

RPGMAKER.net
https://rpgmaker.net/games/12506/

My Dev Twitter:
https://twitter.com/VIKTORTHE_GREAT
